The smart parking network throughout Algeria.

GARINI "is a parking space reservation platform available on PC and iOS / Android Smartphone which offers parking spaces available for reservation depending on the time and location of the applicant.

Why choose Garini?

We offer you an innovative solution to overcome the following difficulties.

Stable income

Our users subscribe to a monthly subscription and monthly payment. This guarantees stable and recurring income

Our users subscribe to a monthly subscription and monthly payment. This guarantees stable and recurring income

Thanks to our partner interface you manage and monitor the performance of your car parks.
